mapper.insert: insert into reply_tb(reply_id, draft_id, reply_content, reply_user_id,parent_id,create_time) values (#{replyId},#{draftId},#{replyContent},#{replyUserId},#{parentId},#{createTime})
mapper.select: select r1.reply_user_id as replyUserId, u1.username as replyUsername,r1.reply_content as replyContent, r1.create_time as replyTime, r2.reply_user_id as parentUserId,u2.username as parentUsername from one_car_db.reply_tb r1 join one_car_db.user_tb u1 on u1.user_id=r1.reply_user_id join one_car_db.reply_tb r2 on r1.parent_id=r2.reply_id join one_car_db.user_tb u2 on r2.reply_user_id=u2.user_id where r2.parent_id=#{replyId}
